title: American Horror Story | Hotel trailer
author: Edits by Elise
comment: WAIT WAIT WHAT THIS ISNT THE ACTUAL TRAILER? WOW MASTERPIECE THIS VID IS SO UNDERRATED

One of my favourite AHS seasons. The Countess is to me the most iconic character from AHS. 
P.S. Evan Peters is fantastic as JPM.

For anyone confused, here are the major storylines: 
-John Lowe, a detective, the father of Holden who had an uncanny disappearance, visits the Hotel Cortez while leading the case of the Ten Commandments Killer
-The Countess committed some crimes in her prime, and Ramona Royale was widowed when The Countess killed her companion. She recruits Donovan, a companion of The Countess, and Iris, the Hotel Cortez receptionist, to help get revenge
a truly perfect masterpiece. I loved it a lot
description:
